body.raw:
# Monorepo Migration Case Study

How a growing startup used Codebuff to consolidate their repositories.

## The Challenge

Managing 20+ repositories was becoming a maintenance burden.

## The Solution

Codebuff assisted with:
- Repository analysis
- Dependency management
- Build system updates
- Test suite consolidation
